title: Community Management
introDescription: X8C offers 24/7 community moderation services with a focus on brand representation, professional communication, and community building through engaging content. Trust us as your preferred project partner to sustain and foster your projectâ€™s native community.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Establishing Standards
processList.text: Our first step in managing a thriving online community is to establish clear operational standards. This includes determining the number of shifts needed to moderate the community, the number of our moderators required for each shift, and the duration of each shift.

processList.label: Kickstarting
processList.text: Once the operational standards have been established, our moderation team will kickstart the process by learning about your specific needs and goals. This includes us gaining a thorough understanding of your project and its objectives.

processList.label: AI-Powered-Bots
processList.text: We will introduce relevant bots into the channels to automate certain tasks and improve the moderation team's efficiency. These bots will be used to answer frequently asked questions, flag inappropriate content, or monitor the community for potential issues.

processList.label: Community Connection
processList.text: Our key to managing a thriving online community will be to actively engage with the members, answer questions, address concerns, and escalate any issues regarding your project.

processList.label: Recap and Support
processList.text: To ensure that your community is well-managed and all our moderation tasks are completed efficiently and effectively, we will provide regular recaps and support.
